SEARCH
Package util

Class Util

java.lang.Object
util.Util
public class Util extends Object
This class has all method that prepare the data to be displayed in the console.

  • Method Details

    • clrScr

      public static void clrScr()
      Clears the console screen using a system-specific command. Only works on Windows; may not be compatible with other operating systems.

    • wait

      public static void wait(int millisecond)
      Pauses execution for the specified amount of milliseconds.
      Parameters:
      millisecond - The number of milliseconds to wait.

    • getSellMenu

      public static ArrayList<String> getSellMenu(ArrayList<Sell> sells)
      Generates a menu with all available sales for displaying in the console.
      Parameters:
      sells - List of sales to be displayed.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings representing the sales menu options.

    • getLoanMenu

      public static ArrayList<String> getLoanMenu(ArrayList<Loan> loans)
      Generates a menu with all active loans for displaying in the console.
      Parameters:
      loans - List of loans to be displayed.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings representing the loan menu options.

    • bookForLoanToMenu

      public static ArrayList<String> bookForLoanToMenu(ArrayList<Book> booksForLoan)
      Generates a menu with all books available for loan, displaying only available books.
      Parameters:
      booksForLoan - List of books that can be loaned.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings representing the available books menu.

    • bookForSellToMenu

      public static ArrayList<String> bookForSellToMenu(ArrayList<BookCopy> booksForSell, Library library)
      Generates a menu with all book copies available for sale.
      Parameters:
      booksForSell - List of book copies available for sale.
      library - Reference to the library to retrieve contextual information.
      Returns:
      ArrayList of strings representing the books for sale menu.

    • menu

      public static int menu(String[] options, Scanner scanner)
      Displays a menu based on the provided options and retrieves the user’s selection.
      Parameters:
      options - Array of menu options to be displayed.
      scanner - Scanner instance for reading user input.
      Returns:
      The user's choice as an integer.

    • menu

      public static int menu(ArrayList<String> options, Scanner scanner)
      Displays a menu based on the provided list of options and retrieves the user’s selection.
      Parameters:
      options - ArrayList of menu options to be displayed.
      scanner - Scanner instance for reading user input.
      Returns:
      The user's choice as an integer.
